attributes.action: urge the FA to strip John Terry of the England captaincy. The many reasons described below, show why John Terry can not be sent to South Africa as captain of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.strettyender.com/john-terry-catalogue-shame

John Terry's indiscretions include but are not limited to: mocking the 9/11 terrorist attacks, selling tours of the Chelsea training ground for £10,000 and cheating on his wife on numerous occasions, the most recent being with the ex girlfriend of an England team mate. For these reasons, we the undersigned believe John Terry can no longer command the respect of his peers and is not fit to lead this country's football team.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
